Module ehubicka.scheduler
Package ehubicka.Database

Class AppointmentDAO

java.lang.Object
ehubicka.Database.AppointmentDAO
public class AppointmentDAO extends Object
Used for accessing the appointments table in the MySql database.

    • getMonthTypeCounts

      public static int getMonthTypeCounts(String type, int month)
      Method used in the reports controller for getting the appointment counts per month for a given appointment type. Used in the first report.
      Parameters:
      type - is the type of appointment.
      month - is the specific month where appointments will be tallied.
      Returns:
      the count for month.

    • insertAppointment

      public static void insertAppointment(String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Insert a new appointment record into the database.
      Parameters:
      title - is the appointment title.
      description - is the appointment description.
      location - is the appointment location.
      type - is the appointment type.
      startDateTime - is the appointment starting date and timestamp.
      endDateTime - is the appointment ending date and timestamp.
      customerId - is the customer Id associated with the appointment.
      userId - is the user Id associated with the appointment.
      contactId - is the contact Id associated with the appointment.

    • update

      public static void update(int appointmentId, String title, String description, String location, String type, LocalDateTime startDateTime, LocalDateTime endDateTime, int customerId, int userId, int contactId)
      Modify an existing record of an appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - is the unique id for the appointment (primary key).
      title - is the appointment title.
      description - is the appointment description.
      location - is the appointment location.
      type - is the appointment type.
      startDateTime - is the appointment starting date and timestamp.
      endDateTime - is the appointment ending date and timestamp.
      customerId - is the customer Id associated with the appointment.
      userId - is the user Id associated with the appointment.
      contactId - is the contact Id associated with the appointment.

    • deleteAppointment

      public static int deleteAppointment(int appointmentId) throws SQLException
      Remove an existing record of an appointment in the database.
      Parameters:
      appointmentId - is the unique id for the appointment (primary key).
      Returns:
      how many records were removed. Essentially verifies that an appointment record was deleted.
      Throws:
      SQLException - for database errors.
